name: Intern Fantasy
description:
Controls

Use Arrow Keys for everything: moving, interacting & advancing dialogue. 

Walk into things to interact with them.

Story

A micro adventure for the Nokia 3310 Jam. You are an intern and have been assigned an important quest: get your boss some coffee. Are you up for the task?

I wish I had time to add battles, music, and sound effects.

Credits

Programming, Art, Design: Damon Bolesta

Special Thanks to:

Dennis Payne for some nice 8x8 tiles: https://opengameart.org/content/1bit-8x8-tileset

Daniel Linssen for the m3x6 font: https://managore.itch.io/m3x6
